    • 01 - Data cleaning

Reference

All functions

adapt_estimation_atlas()

Adapt estimation atlas from Erö et al. to be used in the analysis

atlas_estimation

Atlas with estimation of number of cells per brain area by Erö et al.

atlas_tree

Allen Brain Reference Atlas tree structure of brain areas.

calculate_density()

Calculate density of active cells

categorize_strategy()

Categorize the strategy of brain areas based on the relationship between median count of + cells and median of mean intensity of protein expression.

cfos_expression_aba

Expression of cfos from Allen Brain Atlas API

clean_counts()

Clean xyz coordinates of identified cells

example

Miniature example of whole-brain imaging data over time from Bonapersona et al.

find_all_children()

Find smaller areas (children) of a larger brain area categorization (parent) in the Allen Brain Atlas.

find_changed_strategy()

Find brain areas that meet the criteria for analysis of strategy across groups

find_children()

Find smaller areas (children) of a larger brain area categorization (parent) in the Allen Brain Atlas.

find_intercept()

Function to find where an interpolated linear curve crosses a y value

find_most_active()

Find most active brain areas

find_parents()

Find larger grouping areas (parents) of a smaller brain area (child) in the Allen Brain Atlas.

from_aba_api_to_df()

Convert data downloaded from Allen Brain Atlas API to a dataframe

hello()

Hello, World!

mask

Mask for data cleaning of whole-brain microscopy.

normalize()

Normalize cell counts

order_brain_areas()

Order time of activation of brain areas based on their expression levels

pairwise_activation()

Calculate pairwise activation across groups

plotting_all_coordinates_2d()

Plot all combinations of xyz coordinates in 2D

plotting_coordinates_2d()

Plot combinations of xyz coordinates in 2D

prepare_sim_weights()

Prepare weights for simulation

preprocess_per_region()

Normalize and scale for region-based analyses

remove_blinding()

Remove (or scramble) blinding of your groups

samples_files_to_df()

Merges in one data frame all the separate samples' files

sim_most_active()

Simulate most active brain areas for one experiment

sim_most_active_one_batch()

Simulate most active brain areas for one batch

specify_damage()

Specify damaged areas per sample

summarize_per_region()

Transform xyz coordinates data in a summary per brain region

voxelize()

Voxelize xyz coordinates

Contents

Developed by Valeria Bonapersona.
